title: Cat. 75  Ia orana Maria (Hail Mary), 1894/95, published Mar. 1895
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Ia orana Maria (Hail Mary)  
1894/95, published Mar. 1895  
Transfer zincograph on coarse-grained transfer paper, in dark-blue ink on cream wove paper (an imitation Japanese vellum); 380 × 282 mm  
The Art Institute of Chicago, Albert Roullier Memorial Collection, 1921.370  
Guérin 51, Kornfeld 27 B,b

Ia orana Maria (Hail Mary)  
1894/95, published Mar. 1895  
Transfer zincograph on coarse-grained transfer paper, in dark-blue ink on thin ivory wove paper (an imitation Japanese vellum); 380 × 282 mm  
The Art Institute of Chicago, gift of Edward McCormick Blair, 2002.263  
Guérin 51, Kornfeld 27 C

</section><section id="figures">Left, Ia orana Maria (Hail Mary), 1894/95, published Mar. 1895 (cat. 75.1). Right, Ia orana Maria (Hail Mary), 1894/95, published Mar. 1895 (cat. 75.2).

</section>
